ghost

Class Chaser

  • java.lang.Object
    • ghost.Chaser
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ambusher, Ignorant, Whim

    public class Chaser
extends java.lang.Object
    A kind of Ghost.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Chaser

        public Chaser(int x,
              int y,
              processing.core.PImage ghost,
              processing.core.PImage frightened,
              int speed)
        Constructs a new Chaser object. The instance stores the parameters as its own properties.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-axis position
        y - the y-axis position
        ghost - image of chaser
        frightened - image of frightened chaser
        speed - the speed of chaser

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public void move()
        Move the chaser according to field 'goHorizon' and field 'goVertical'

        When goHorizon is greater than 0, it means y-axis plus goHorizon which is positive, go down, vice versa. When goVertical is greater than 0, it means x-axis plus goVertical which is positive, go right, vice versa.

      • getX

        public int getX()
        Get the x-asis position of the chaser
        Returns:
        the x-asis position of the chaser

      • getY

        public int getY()
        Get the y-asis position of the chaser
        Returns:
        the y-asis position of the chaser

      • getTarget

        public int[] getTarget()
        Get the target of chaser
        Returns:
        an array contains two integers, the first element is x-axis position and the second one is y-axis position.

      • getFrightened

        public boolean getFrightened()
        Set the status of this ghost.
        Returns:
        frightened is true, false is not frightened.

      • setFrightened

        public void setFrightened(boolean status)
        Set the status of this ghost.
        Parameters:
        status - true is frightened, false is not frightened.

                                int startY,
                                int endX,
                                int endY)

        Parameters:

        startY - y-axis of the start position
        endX - x-axis of the end position
        endY - y-axis of the end position
        Returns:
        return the distance between two sets of coordinates

      • setMode

        public void setMode(boolean isScatter,
                    Player player,
                    MyMap map,
                    Chaser chaser)
        Set the mode of the player. If any reference parameter is null, do nothing.
        Parameters:
        isScatter - whether the player is in scatter mode.
        player - An object of the class Player.
        map - An object of the class MyMap.
        chaser - An object of the class Chaser.

      • updateTarget

        public void updateTarget(boolean isScatter,
                         Player player,
                         Chaser chaser)
        Update the target according to different modes.

        Upper left corner (0, 0), Upper right corner (28 * 16, 0), Bottom left (0, 35 * 16), Bottom right (28 * 16, 35 * 16)
        If any reference parameter is null, do nothing.

        Parameters:
        isScatter - If it is true, the mode is 'scatter'.If it is false, the mode is 'chase'.
        player - An object of Player.
        chaser - An object of the class Chaser.

      • checkTarget

        public void checkTarget()
        If the target location is outside the bounds of the grid, the closest point is used.

      • canGo

        public boolean canGo(java.lang.String direction,
                     MyMap map)
        Whether one direction can go. If any reference parameter is null, do nothing.
        Parameters:
        direction - The string of one direction.
        map - An object of MyMap
        Returns:
        Whether this direction can go.

      • constructPriorities

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> constructPriorities()

      • setDirection

        public void setDirection(java.lang.String direction)
        Change the displacement in the corresponding direction. If any reference parameter is null, do nothing.
        Parameters:
        direction - direction String, including "Left" "Right" "Up" "Down".

      • setPriorityDirection

        public void setPriorityDirection(java.util.List<java.lang.String> priorities,
                                 MyMap map)
        Change the displacement of the chaser in the most suitable direction. In short, change the direction of the ghost.
        Parameters:
        priorities - A list of string represents directions.
        map - An object of MyMap.

      • prefixSum

        public static int[] prefixSum(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> modeLengths)
        prefix sum of the list modeLengths If any reference parameter is null, return null.

        For example :
        modeLengths: [2, 20, 2, 30, 2, 100]
        prefixSum: [0,2, 22, 24, 54, 56, 156]
        so the number in prefix sum represents the current time(second) If the current time is 52, 52 % 156 = 52 and 52 is between 24 and 54.

        Parameters:
        modeLengths - The list of integer represents the length of every mode.
        Returns:
        The prefix sum of the list modeLengths.If modeLengths is null, return null.

      • drawGhosts

        public static boolean drawGhosts(processing.core.PApplet app,
                                 java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> modeLengths,
                                 int frameCount,
                                 int frightenedLen,
                                 java.util.List<Chaser> allGhosts,
                                 java.util.List<Chaser> chasers,
                                 Player player,
                                 MyMap map)
        Draw all ghosts according to their modes. If any reference parameter is null, return false.
        Parameters:
        app - An object of App class which is a subclass of PApplet.
        modeLengths - The list of integer represents the length of every mode.
        frameCount - The number of current frame.
        frightenedLen - The length of frightened.
        allGhosts - The list of all ghosts.
        chasers - The list of chasers.
        player - An object of Player.
        map - An object of MyMap.
        Returns:
        If the player is eaten by the ghost, return true, If not, return false. If any reference parameter is null, return false.
